attributes.action: award Ryan Giggs with a Knighthood for his services to football, sport and this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ryan Giggs is the most successful player in English football. He has shown total loyalty to his club, has been a wonderful advert for the professional footballer and done amazing works for youth and charity. I'm sure all football fans can look beyond their own club loyalty and recognize the wonderful player/man that Ryan is. 

It would be a real salute for Ryan to be knighted before he left the game so true respect could be shown all around the country as he plays his final seasons by his many fans and admirers.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
